Oknum Polisi Pelaku Penculikan WN Inggris Ditahan di Polda Metro
07 Nov 2019, 18:57 by Samsudhuha Wildansyah
Jakarta - Polda Metro Jaya sudah melakukan penahanan kepada para tersangka penculikan dan pemerasan kepada WN Inggris atas atas nama Matthew Simon Craib. Pelaku yang ditahan itu termasuk pelaku dari oknum polisi.
"Ya tentunya kan anggota dan warga sipil sudah kita lakukan penahanan dan semuanya akan kita proses. Kita tunggu saja bagaimana proses tersebut," kata Kabid Humas Polda Metro Jaya, Kombes Pol Argo Yuwono di Polda Metro Jaya, Jakarta, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Argo tidak merinci siapa saja pelaku yang ditahan dalam kasus itu. Dia juga enggan berkomentar lebih terkait kasus tersebut.
"(Motif pelaku) nanti. Berkas jadi dikirim ke jaksa baru kita sampaikan semuanya," ungkap Argo.
Sebelumnya diberitakan, penculikan Matthew Simon Craib terjadi pada 30 Oktober 2019. Pelaku penculikan merupakan rekan kerja korban yang memiliki ide jahat itu.
Dalam kasus yang berawal dari laporan polisi bernomor LP/7002/X/2019/PMJ/Ditreskrimum tertanggal 31 Oktober 2019 dengan pelapor VL, rekan Matthew itu, Kombes Argo Yuwono sebelumnya mengatakan ada 6 pelaku yang turut serta melakukan aksi kejahatan itu. Empat pelaku di antaranya merupakan anggota Polri.
Kasus bermula ketika korban Matthew, pada 29 Oktober 2019, memberi tahu rekannya yakni VL bahwa dia ingin bertemu seseorang terkait urusan pekerjaan. Pada 30 Oktober 2019 pukul 02.00 WIB, korban memberitahukan kepada VL sudah dalam perjalanan pulang dan ternyata diketahui diculik dengan para pelaku meminta tebusan sekitar USD 1 juta.
VL lantas membuat laporan pada Kamis (31/10/2019) sekitar pukul 08.00 WIB dan Ditreskrimum Polda Metro Jaya kemudian menindaklanjutinya. Sekitar pukul 13.00 WIB di kawasan Kemayoran, Jakarta Pusat, para pelaku ditangkap.

(sam/mea)

Person of Police Acting on Kidnapping of Indonesian Citizens Detained in Metro Police
Nov 7 2019, 18:57 by Samsudhuha Wildansyah
Jakarta - The Jakarta Police has detained suspects of kidnapping and extortion of British citizens on behalf of Matthew Simon Craib. The perpetrators who were arrested included the perpetrators of the police.
"Yes, of course we have detained members and civilians, and we will process everything. We will wait for the process," said Head of Metro Jaya Police Public Relations Commissioner, Argo Yuwono Police Commissioner at Metro Jaya Regional Police Headquarters, Jakarta, Thursday (7/11) 2019).
Argo did not specify who was detained in the case. He was also reluctant to comment more related to the case.
"(Motive of the perpetrators) later. The file will be sent to the prosecutor, we will convey everything," said Argo.
Previously reported, the abduction of Matthew Simon Craib occurred on 30 October 2019. The kidnappers were victims' co-workers who had the evil idea.
In the case that began with a police report numbered LP / 7002 / X / 2019 / PMJ / Ditreskrimum dated October 31, 2019 with VL reporter, Matthew's colleague, Senior Commissioner Argo Yuwono previously said there were 6 perpetrators participating in the crime. Four of these are police officers.
The case began when the victim Matthew, on October 29, 2019, told his colleague VL that he wanted to meet someone related to work matters. On 30 October 2019 at 02.00 WIB, the victim told VL that he was on his way home and it was found that he had been kidnapped with the perpetrators asking for a ransom of around USD 1 million.
VL then made a report on Thursday (10/31/2019) around 08.00 WIB and the Jakarta Police Directorate General Criminal Investigation then followed up on it. At around 1:00 pm West Indonesian Time in the Kemayoran area, Central Jakarta, the perpetrators were arrested.

(sam / mea)
